text:
Thank you Konrad! I have checked your website and it is interesting that in addition to future of coding thoughts we have structural biology in common. I am actually going to UCSF soon to work on Chimera!
It would be very nice to meet you, I am thinking about the first two weeks of November? You can email me at <mailto:hamish.todd1@gmail.com|hamish.todd1@gmail.com>
